articles.title: Sanju Samson to get chance in playing XI: India's predicted XI vs SA, 1st ODI - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Team India will begin their three-match ODI series vs South Africa on Sunday. Here is their predicted XI for the first ODI. | Cricket
articles.content: After managing to hold hosts South Africa to a 1-1 draw in their three-match T20I series, Team India will begin their three-match ODI series on Sunday in Johannesburg. India put in a dominant display… [+2095 chars]
